arStrings.szText:
Provides the opportunity for Raheir to offer a cache of random {c_links} Grigoire Summoning Materials{/c} during{icon:Marker_Bartering, 2.4}{c_important}Bartering{/c}. 

{c_label}Bartering:{/c} This {c_important}Trade Agreement{/c} will go into effect on the Mercenary's next new stock delivery. It does not guarantee stock of these items. The more difficult the item is to obtain, the less frequent it will be offered.
